SENT.plain: Behcet's disease is known as a chronic systemic vasculitic syndrome, the hallmark of which is recurrent oral aphthous and genital ulcerations and uveitis
Vascular involvement, mainly thrombosis, reportedly affects as many as one-third of patients
Cardiac involvement, however, is very rare
We present in this report a young female patient developing right ventricular thrombus while being treated medically
